About

Hey, I'm Ricky LeVan, a student of pure and applied math at Rice University. Welcome to my blog! One of my big interests is abstraction, and how it allows us to make better technology. If you like this stuff too, enjoy the blog! Feel free to let me know what you think.

You can reach me at rick.levan@gmail.com
